favourites.name: Almond Joy
favourites.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

favourites.name: English Highball
favourites.description: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)
